revised_title: Mass-Dependent Spheroidal Harmonics of Spin One-Half
tldr: The author presents a perturbation procedure to determine the characteristic values and corresponding angular functions of mass-dependent spheroidal harmonics of spin one-half in Kerr geometry. The method applies to other cases considered in the literature and provides a more convergent expansion than previous methods. The study focuses on the mass of particles and their impact on the angular functions in Dirac's equation.
